```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, pliman)
```

```{r}
f0 <- image_import("exp_pics/az_1.jpeg")
dpi(f0)
```


```{r}
back <- pick_palette(f0)
```


```{r}
fore <- pick_palette(f0)
```


```{r}
res <- 
analyze_objects(f0,
                background = back,
                foreground = fore,
                watershed = FALSE)

```

```{r}
meas <- get_measures(res, dpi = 81)
plot_measures(meas, measure = "circularity")

plot_measures(meas,
              col = "black",
              measure = "area",
              size = 2)
```

quero filtrar objetos com circularidade maior a 0.8

```{r}
meas %>%  
  # as.data.frame  %>%   
  dplyr::filter(circularity>.8)
```
